Class TPUReplicateMetadata

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOp
org.tensorflow.op.tpu.TPUReplicateMetadata
All Implemented Interfaces:
Op
@Deprecated @Operator(group="tpu") public final class TPUReplicateMetadata extends RawOp
Deprecated.
use ReplicateMetadata instead
Metadata indicating how the TPU computation should be replicated. This operation holds the metadata common to operations of a tpu.replicate() computation subgraph.
